room_title: Escape room "Al Capone's Den" by Psych Escape Room in Chicago
review: The Al Capone room is perfect for groups both small and large. The cooperative and competitive elements of the mystery solving provide for a great experience.

room_title: Escape room "Al Capone's Den" by Psych Escape Room in Chicago
review: We had a great time in the AL Capone room. Even when we felt like we weren't progressing the staff gave us a nudge in the right direction. I can't wait to do another!

room_title: Escape room "Al Capone's Den" by Psych Escape Room in Chicago
review: I had a lot of fun in the Al Capone room. It was just three of us girls. We did not get out in time but definitely will be coming back! Great girls night out!

room_title: Escape room "Al Capone's Den" by Psych Escape Room in Chicago
review: We had a great time. Al Capone room was a lot of fun. Staff very friendly. Can’t wait to do the Lake House.

room_title: Escape room "Al Capone's Den" by Psych Escape Room in Chicago
review: We went yesterday for my husband’s birthday. It was a group of 7 and a first for all of us. We did the Capone room and had a blast. Can’t wait to go back and do the other 2 rooms!
